name: My Blog
body:
Don`t trust sites that you don`t know,as they could be trying to get your personal information to send you stuff,so only go on,safe,reliable sites that will give you the best experience.
 
black hat hackers,white hat hackers,and grey hat hackers are all different types of hackers,grey hat hackers try to hack the web for greater good

_never_ become a hacker as you could ruin someone's life,by accusing someone falsely

A "black hat" hacker is a hacker who "violates computer security for personal gain"

A white hat hacker breaks security to test there software for security protection

Bluehat or Blue Hat or Blue-Hat is a term used to refer to outside computer security consulting firms that are employed to bug test a system prior to its launch, looking for exploits so they can be closed. In particular, Microsoft uses the term to refer to the computer security professionals they invited to find the vulnerability of their products such as Windows.
**bytes**
1000		kilo
1000 2		mega
1000 3		giga
1000 4		tera
1000 5		peta
1000 6		exa
1000 7          zetta
1000 8		yotta
The byte  is a unit of digital information that most commonly consists of eight bits. Historically, the byte was the number of bits used to encode a single character of text in a computer and for this reason it is the smallest addressable unit of memory in many computer architectures.

binary is how computers store information it goes 1,2,4,8,16,32 ECT it can also store colour and video(25 pictures a second)
In mathematics and IT, a binary number is a number that instead of base 10,base 2 using only 0 (zero) and 1 (one).
